snippet: The apartments are said to be selling well in Rawabi, a Palestinian city being constructed from the ground up in the West Bank, but paying for the city itself has not been easy.
abstract: Developers have already started selling apartments in planned city of Rawabi, Palestinian city outside Ramallah in West Bank though construction is far from complete and faces many hurdles; precarious political environment means that project is dependent on cooperation of Israel for necessary water as well as access to site.
lead_paragraph: The apartments are said to be selling well in Rawabi, a Palestinian city being constructed from the ground up in the West Bank, but paying for the city itself has not been easy.

headline.main: Birth of a Palestinian City Is Punctuated by Struggles
headline.print_headline: Birth of a Palestinian City Is Punctuated by Struggles
